stories.title: State of QUIC and HTTP/3 in Nginx (with nice eBPF use case)

stories.text: This is for someone who is very experienced and technically proficient, and with hard-work and enterprise has worked all the way to the top. The person was asked last year to manage and grow the whole multi-million dollar fashion retail vertical and has been given a free hand on everything (except finance that the parent company wants an MBA to handle). The person now feels a bit lost and overwhelmed in the world of Excel, reports and charts and feels their performance is not upto par.
stories.title: Ask HN: What business course is recommended to manage a multi-million $ company?
